body:
Hi,


I've just subscribed to the list, and at my office we're preparing to 
work on an application based on Radiance.


I haven't seen any traffic come through the list, so I suppose it's very 
quiet at the moment?


Our project may or may not require some Radiance source code tweaking. 
Can such tweaks be committed back to the main source, if they are 
acceptable?


Thanks,


Chris
___
